Body.Content:
We are announcing the ability to enable auto-cleanup for jobs and logs to manage storage in Microsoft Dataverse. This feature will reach general availability on August 31, 2025.

How does this affect me?
This feature enhances management of async operations system jobs and plug-in trace logs by allowing admins to set a retention period. This will improve system performance and saves on storage by cleaning up system jobs and plug-in trace logs to comply with your company's retention policy.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

Title: Microsoft Dataverse - Enable auto-cleanup for jobs and logs to manage storage
